entries.text: Hi, I'd like to cancel my recent order, number 987654321. My name is Robert Johnson.
Certainly, Robert. To verify your identity, could you please provide your date of birth and the last four digits of the credit card used for this purchase?
My date of birth is 01/15/1985, and the card ends in 1234. The full card number is 4111-2222-3333-4444.
Thank you for that information. I'm processing the cancellation now. It might take a few minutes.
Your order 987654321 has been successfully cancelled. You should receive a confirmation email shortly.
Excellent! Thank you for your help. Is there anything else I need to do?
No, that's all. The refund will be processed within 3-5 business days. Have a great day!
